attributes.action: release, both in concise form, and fully to those whom request it, the balace sheet of the United Kingdom...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
...as if it were a regular company. This should include all PFI and any 'hidden' schemes.
The country, and the government-in-waiting, should know what state our finances are in.
The concise version should be leafleted to every single household in the UK, and made freely available via the internet. The detailed (full) version should be accessed by special request.
We are all shareholders in the UK, and I feel that we should be respected and trusted with this information.
Thankyou.
